original_text: Now on the twenty-fourth day of this month the people of Israel were assembled with fasting and in sackcloth, and with earth on their heads.
korean_text: 그 달 스무나흗 날에 이스라엘 자손이 다 모여 금식하며 굵은 베 옷을 입고 티끌을 무릅쓰며

sentences.original_text: Now on the twenty-fourth day of this month
the people of Israel were assembled
and with earth on their heads.
